msbt.message: You're the best! Thank you for such an awesome birthday prezzie, ! How did you know EXACTLY what I wanted?! You make me happy dance! Oh, and I got you something too!
Thanks for coming to my b-day party! Your prezzie was TOTES ah-maze-ing! To say thanks, I attached something to this card! I hope you love it!
Thank you for giving me the most amazing birthday prezzie! It's like you took starlight and music and mushed it all together into a perfect prezzie! I got you a thing too. I hope you love it!
Thanks for the birthday prezzie! I was totes NOT expecting to get THAT from YOU! I've attached a little something to say thanks. I hope you like it!

Thanks for the b-day prezzie! I can totes tell that you, like, meditated (or something?) before picking it out! It made me feel SO special! I've attached a surprise to this letter. I hope you love it!
That birthday prezzie you gave me is SO you, , and it just made me so SUPER happy! Hey, I, you know, for fun, attached a gift for you to this letter! I hope it makes you dance!
